title: Construction Assembly Destination
summary: Ryan BensonThinkOrbital Inc. ThinkOrbital is proud to propose the first milestone in the development of in-space manufacturing at scale. ThinkOrbital, the leader in ISAM&C technologies, having flown the first robotically controlled in-space welding in May of ’24, is the ideal team to lay the groundwork for ISAM&C of a scale currently relegated to science fiction.
